thread.title: Cailean Wood Named General Manager at Advantage Ford

author: cnbc.com
title: Cailean Wood Named General Manager at Advantage Ford
text:
CALGARY, Alberta, May 04, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Wood Automotive Group is pleased to announce the appointment of Mr. Cailean Wood as General Manager, Advantage Ford, Calgary. Most recently Cailean served as Sales Manager at Big 4 Motors, the group’s Chrysler/Jeep dealership.
Cailean Wood named General Manager at Advantage Ford, Calgary
“As a young teenager I washed cars and pulled weeds at Okotoks Ford,” says Cailean. “It’s an honour for me to follow my grandfather James, my father Gerry and my brother Rory as a dealership general manager and Advantage Ford is the perfect place.” The dealership just celebrated its 23 rd anniversary and recently completed a major renovation adding more showroom space, more service bays and a new drive through service centre offering no appointment oil changes.
Cailean has been with the Wood Automotive Group full time since 2011. He was the general manager at All Makes Collision Centre and then oversaw the opening and served as general manager at Driverz Auto, the company’s pre-owned vehicle specialty store. Following that, he held sales manager positions at Big 4 and Advantage.
Cailean holds a Bachelor of Business Administration degree specializing in marketing and management from St. Francis Xavier University in Nova Scotia followed by post-graduate studies at the National Automobile Dealers Association.
“Advantage Ford is a performance vehicle specialist and we have one of Alberta’s best selections of Mustang GTs and F-150 Raptors,” says Cailean. “Along with our other Ford vehicles like the Escape, Focus and Explorer you might say we’re built for comfort and affordability but with a need for speed.”
About Advantage Ford
Located on McLeod Trail South, under the giant Canadian flag, Advantage Ford has a comprehensive inventory of new Ford cars, trucks and SUVs as well as dozens of pre-owned vehicles in stock. The dealership has a staff of more than fifty.
About Wood Automotive Group
Based in Calgary, Alberta and with of staff of almost 600, the Wood Automotive Group includes Woodridge Ford, Woodridge Lincoln, Advantage Ford, Okotoks Ford, Okotoks Lincoln, Big 4 Motors, Village Honda, Driverz Auto, Cavalcade Auto Acceptance and All Makes Collision Centre.

Cailean Wood
General Manager
